author: ellisaul
content: hey everyone! can please anyone tell me if there is a way to test the prefix change for withdrawal https://notes.ethereum.org/@launchpad/withdrawals-guide now?

author: sansar57
content: At least it should be possible to send them back to the address they came from. There has to be a way out.

author: pietjepuk
content: But the address the came from is of no importance at all. Those addresses might even have been compromised in the meantime. I wouldn't get my hopes up of a way out; "keep your mnemonic safe" was in huge bold letters everywhere.

author: sproul
content: yeah you can test on Goerli where the Capella upgrade is already live, info: <https://goerli.launchpad.ethereum.org/en/withdrawals>
